content: here s a hat pattern that is easy to memorize and fits from a child to an adult with a big head or lots of hair knit this up in a couple of hours for a quick gift best of all it takes only one skein of a yarn that s like drugs for your fingers if you haven t knit with catalina alpaca yet you re missing out hurry up and go get some before it finishes after several tries i decided to go with a brim inspired by that one on the cabled newsboy cap by shannita williams-alleyne in stitch & bitch nation shannita thanks for designing that kick-butt brim i love it edited to add the following has been corrected on the pattern pdf *repeat rnds 3 through 10 two more times repeat round 3 once 27 rnds completed approx 5 5 from co edge you should have 4 cables total *
